name: Mineglobe
description:
Please play in fullscreen mode! Otherwise the screen might be cut off at the edges.

Created for Mini Jam 37

Theme: Engineering
Limitation: Game has to take place inside an object

Controls

Move: WASD
Mine: J
Place block beneath the player: K
Jump: Space
Restart game: R

Notes:

If you are unable to jump at some point, try mining away one block below you.
You can only place a block beneath you, not in any other direction.
Timer powerups can only be found above the diamond spawn depht.
